revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SorcFX4Check'''
(''no parameter'')
Decrements special2 by one and if it is negative, jumps to the Death state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|SorcFX4}} and derived classes.
